title: Black Holes and Solitons in String Theory
abstract: In this review, I discuss a general method for constructing classical solutions of the equations of motion arising in the effective low energy string theory, and discuss specific applications of this method. (Based on talks given at the Johns Hopkins Workshop held at Goteborg, June 8-10, 1992, and ICTP Summer Workshop held at Trieste, July 2-3, 1992)
